unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my grandma passed. My doctor at AIIMS suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical, like something out of a Karan Johar film - too modern! But it helped me track my feelings. It wasn't a cure, but it offered a small support, like having a cup of chai in the evening. It helped a little, just a little.
